name: 3D Chess (itch) (Saahil Talha)
description:
Chess, but 3D. A classical game of chess, but how many can you play online, in 3D?

Now with 4 themes, 2 boards and 2 tech-y. Choose your own theme.

--Instructions--

Everything looks predictable except the round head and the box beside (diamond in the tech). Round head's the Queen and the other is the King. Crosses depict bishops, 4 squares depict the horses, big boxes are the rooks. The front line of smaller boxes are the pawns. Let the game begin!

Extra - Consider buying me a coffee ☕ before running the game!
